title: Katie Price claims Rebekah Vardy 'MUST be' guilty of leaking stories about Coleen Rooney
text:
Katie Price has waded in on the WAG war between Rebekah Vardy and Coleen Rooney in a YouTube video shared on Tuesday.

The former glamour model, 41, claimed she felt the heavily pregnant star, 37, 'must be guilty' otherwise the TV personality, 33, wouldn't have accused her.

Detailing the scandal to fans, she explained: 'I can't believe that. Some people have said "Do you think this is true?"

Scroll down for video

Opinion: Katie Price claimed Rebekah Vardy 'MUST be' guilty of leaking stories about Coleen Rooney as she waded in on the WAG war in a YouTube on Tuesday

'Coleen, I've met her at an event, she seems very nice. Rebekah Vardy, I've met Rebekah Vardy a few times.

'I'm just saying, and I'm not taking sides, but Coleen seems a bit like me. You don't say stuff unless you have evidence.

'Anyone I've outed is for a reason if they've really tried to damage me, for example my best friends when they betrayed me with the husband.

'Of course I'm gonna out them, I'm gonna name and shame them, put their name out there, pictures the lot. Why wouldn't you?'

Thoughts: Discussing the scandal to fans, she explained: ''I'm just saying, and I'm not taking sides, but Coleen seems a bit like me. You don't say stuff unless you have evidence'

Seeing both sides: Katie went on to admit that she felt sorry for Rebekah 'getting all this s***' but also said she does 'genuinely believe Coleen'

Katie went on to admit that she felt sorry for Rebekah 'getting all this s***' but also said she does 'genuinely believe Coleen would not put this statement out unless she had evidence because she could get done for defamatory.'

She continued: 'Rebekah's having a baby, she's heavily pregnant. There's no way, there must be truth in it, there's got to be.

'I'm sorry to say that, people can hate me. Do what you like, I'm used to it, troll me. There's got to be truth in it, that is hardcore.'

MailOnline have contacted Rebekah's representatives for comment.

Shock: Rebekah was accused by Coleen of leaking stories about her to The Sun newspaper, which the expectant I'm A Celebrity star has fiercely denied (pictured in June 2016)

Rebekah was accused by Coleen of leaking stories about her to The Sun newspaper, which the expectant I'm A Celebrity star has fiercely denied.

Sources close to Becky say leading law firm Kingsley Napley has sent Coleen a letter on her behalf demanding she provides them with the evidence she has against Becky so that she can complete her investigation.

Becky has called in a forensic team to analyse her Instagram account and identify the mole who sold fake stories to The Sun from Coleen’s Instagram account.

As part of that probe, they say, they have asked Wayne’s wife to give them the proof they have that the source must have been Becky’s Instagram account.

Tackling things: Shortly after Rebekah spoke out, Coleen, 33, claimed the pregnant star had been leaking stories from her private Instagram to The Sun newspaper

The feuding pair are said to be communicating through their lawyers in the wake of the bitter row which has dominated social media and newspapers this week.

A source close to heavily pregnant Vardy now claims she is fully prepared to face her fellow WAG in court if she refuses to believe her innocence.

An insider exclusively told MailOnline on Wednesday night that 'Rebekah wants to prove she had nothing to do with the leaked stories and is working with a lawyer and IT experts who can look at the forensics of her Instagram, which several people have access to.'

Serious: The feuding pair are said to be communicating through their lawyers in the wake of the bitter row which has dominated social media and newspapers this week

Meanwhile, friends of Coleen say she will not be goaded into coming forward with any further evidence as she is happy with her own investigations.

A spokesman for Coleen said: 'It is irrefutable that the leaks came from one account, and one account only.'

The scandal has gripped the nation to such an extent that police officers went to the Vardys' home because of the horrific trolling they faced.
description: The former glamour model, 41, waded in on the WAG war between Rebekah Vardy and Coleen Rooney in a YouTube video shared on Tuesday.
